page.title: 03CHURNET VALLEY POPULATION.
page.content: The parish of Alton has 473 households with 1,383 people.91 are of pre-school age, 253 school age,848 of working age and 256 pensionable age.101 households are pensioners only.The population rose by 267 between 1971 and 1981. Farley parish has 186 people in 73 households.There are 9 pre-school age children,24 school age,127 people of working age and 33 pensionable age.The population fell by 36 between 1971 and 1981. Oakamoor parish has 243 households and 692 people.40 are pre-school age, 112 of school age,395 working age and 143 pensionable age.71 households have pensioners only. In Alton 4% of households have neither bath or inside w.c,in Farley 14% and in Oakamoor 9% of households. 1981 census figures.
